nav.mobileFooter: One account, one dashboard for the entire Gigaviz ecosystem.

home.heroTitle: Everything your business needs — from WhatsApp to AI — in one platform.
home.heroDescription: Connect with customers on WhatsApp, automate replies with AI, create content, and manage operations — all from a single workspace with built-in billing and audit.
home.suitesTitle: Three pillars to grow your business
home.suiteGrowthDesc: Reach customers on WhatsApp, Instagram & Messenger. Manage conversations, contacts, and AI-powered replies from one unified inbox.
home.suiteBuildDesc: Generate documents, images, and content with AI. Automate workflows with Helper and build with Studio, Office, and Apps.
home.suiteCommunityDesc: Sell templates, digital products, and services through Marketplace — with integrated billing and workspace-scoped transactions.
home.complianceOfficialApiDesc: All messaging runs through the verified Technology Provider flow with delivery checks.
home.complianceTemplatesDesc: Template creation, review, approvals, and delivery tracking live in one workspace.
home.complianceClarityDesc: Membership, roles, and audit ensure teams know who sent what and why.
home.integrationsSubtitle: Battle-tested infrastructure from verify to deploy.
home.timelineSubtitle: From Meta Hub to full ecosystem — transparent progress.
home.ctaSectionDesc: Start with a free workspace and connect the official Meta Cloud API in minutes.
home.trustSubtitle: Built with enterprise-grade security and compliance.
home.pricingFreeDesc: Explore the platform with no commitment.
home.pricingStarterDesc: For solopreneurs managing clients via WhatsApp.
home.pricingGrowthDesc: For growing teams with omnichannel messaging.
home.pricingBusinessDesc: For established businesses needing full access.

about.title: About Gigaviz
about.subtitle: Unified Digital Ecosystem to Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage.
about.storyTitle: From practical needs to a unified ecosystem
about.storyP1: Gigaviz started from a real problem: small teams needed to move fast without losing control. From there, we designed modules that eventually converged into one unified system. Operated by PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia, this ecosystem is designed to accelerate execution while maintaining clarity and security.
about.storyP2: With the Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage framework, each module is built to reinforce the others — from content production to access control and billing.
about.founderBio: Giusty built Gigaviz so teams can focus on results without being distracted by disconnected tools. His mission is to deliver an ecosystem that is practical, secure, and measurable.
about.problem2: Clear decision-making through data and audit trails.
about.problem3: Access control to keep teams secure as they grow.
about.timeline1Desc: Started from the practical needs of a small team requiring fast, organized workflows.
about.timeline2Desc: Began with messaging and operational solutions, then evolved into a suite of modules.
about.timeline3Desc: All modules unified with consistent identity, workspace, and billing systems.
about.timeline4Desc: PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia established as the operational foundation for ecosystem expansion.
about.timeline5Desc: Focused on Create, Automate, Monetize, and Manage in one unified system.
about.nsCreateDesc: Help teams produce content, assets, and work materials faster.
about.nsAutomateDesc: Automate routine processes so teams can focus on strategic work.
about.nsMonetizeDesc: Provide billing and transaction tools to support revenue growth.
about.nsManageDesc: Control access, audit trails, and dashboards to scale safely.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to move forward with Gigaviz?
about.ctaDesc: Get Started now to streamline your team workflow.

pricing.trialBadge: 14-Day Free Trial on All Paid Plans
pricing.title: One platform. Eight products. One simple price.
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade as you grow. WhatsApp Business + AI CRM + Omnichannel Inbox — all-in-one, starting at a fraction of competing platforms.
pricing.freeDesc: Explore the platform with no commitment. Perfect for evaluating Gigaviz before upgrading.
pricing.starterDesc: For solopreneurs and freelancers managing clients via WhatsApp.
pricing.growthDesc: For growing teams that need omnichannel messaging, automation, and AI insights.
pricing.growthF5: AI CRM insights & RAG knowledge base
pricing.businessDesc: For established businesses needing mass messaging, advanced analytics, and full platform access.
pricing.enterpriseDesc: For large organizations needing unlimited scale, custom SLA, and dedicated support.
pricing.alwaysIncludedDesc: Every plan — including Free — comes with these essential capabilities so you can start immediately.
pricing.include2: Secure workspace with RLS data isolation
pricing.assurancePhasedDesc: Staged implementation so your team adopts modules at a comfortable pace.
pricing.assuranceBudgetDesc: Per-workspace usage limits, real-time usage dashboard, and budget alerts.
pricing.assuranceNote: Business & Enterprise plans include quarterly roadmap reviews and module customization.
pricing.tokenDesc: Tokens power AI features — smart replies, content generation, CRM insights, and RAG queries. Each plan includes monthly token allowance; top up anytime if you need more.
pricing.tokenNote1: Tokens are consumed per AI request (e.g. 10 tokens per smart reply).
pricing.tokenNote2: Real-time token balance visible in your dashboard.
pricing.tokenNote3: Set workspace-level token budgets to control spend.
pricing.customPlanDesc: Enterprise plans include custom SLA, dedicated support, SSO, and volume discounts. Let's talk.
pricing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Gigaviz pricing and plans.
pricing.faq1Q: Is there really a free plan?
pricing.faq1A: Yes! The Free plan gives you full access to explore the platform with 100 WA messages and 5.000 AI tokens per month. No credit card required. Upgrade whenever you're ready.
pricing.faq2Q: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq2A: We accept Visa, Mastercard, and other major cards via Stripe. Bank transfer and digital wallets (GoPay, OVO, DANA) are available for Indonesian customers.
pricing.faq3Q: Can I change my plan later?
pricing.faq3A: Absolutely. Upgrade or downgrade anytime from your billing dashboard. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle, with prorated adjustments.
pricing.faq4Q: What are tokens and how do they work?
pricing.faq4A: Tokens power AI features like smart replies, content generation, and CRM insights. Each plan includes a monthly token allowance. You can buy additional tokens anytime at competitive rates.
pricing.faq5Q: How does the 14-day free trial work?
pricing.faq5A: Start any paid plan with a 14-day free trial. Full access to all plan features. Cancel before the trial ends and you won't be charged. No commitment required.
pricing.faq6Q: Do you offer annual billing discounts?
pricing.faq6A: Yes! Annual billing saves you 20% compared to monthly. That's like getting over 2 months free every year.
pricing.faq7Q: What happens when I exceed my message or token limit?
pricing.faq7A: You'll receive alerts as you approach your limits. You can top up tokens instantly or upgrade your plan. Messages beyond your limit are queued until the next cycle or until you top up.
pricing.faq8A: Yes. If you cancel within the first 7 days of a paid plan, you're eligible for a full refund. After that, you can cancel anytime and continue using your plan until the end of the billing period.

contact.title: Contact Gigaviz
contact.subtitle: Send your questions or needs, and our team will respond as soon as possible.
contact.note1: Include your main goal and business context.
contact.note2: Share your team size and the targets you want to reach.
contact.note3: If you need press assets, use the official Media Kit.
contact.responseTimeDesc: 1-2 business days for general questions, faster for priority needs.
contact.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

getStarted.title: Get Started with Gigaviz
getStarted.subtitle: Choose the fastest way to join the ecosystem: Individual or Team (Workspace).
getStarted.featureNote: Specific features unlock based on your subscription plan. Token costs (AI/WhatsApp API) are calculated separately based on usage.
getStarted.onboardingTitle: Join the ecosystem in a few steps
getStarted.onboardingDesc: Choose your plan, complete your account, then activate modules based on your needs.
getStarted.step2: Complete your account and verify your email.
getStarted.step3: Activate modules, billing, and tokens based on your plan.
getStarted.comparisonSubtitle: Modules and access are customized based on your chosen plan.
getStarted.trustDesc: We establish security foundations from the start of onboarding to keep the ecosystem safe as it grows.
getStarted.trust1: Security-first with input validation and access control.
getStarted.trust3: Fair use and anti-abuse to maintain service quality.
getStarted.faq1Q: Can I sign up for free?
getStarted.faq1A: Yes. Free accounts have limited access (view-only/locked) until you activate a plan.
getStarted.faq2Q: What's the difference between Individual and Team?
getStarted.faq2A: Individual is for solo creators with 1 workspace. Team provides multi-member access, RBAC, and more comprehensive controls.
getStarted.faq3A: Tokens are AI and WhatsApp API usage charges calculated separately from subscriptions, based on actual usage.
getStarted.faq4A: Yes, your plan can be adjusted anytime based on your team's needs and activated modules.
getStarted.faq5Q: Do I need a credit card?
getStarted.faq5A: Not always. Payment methods depend on your plan and applicable billing policies.
getStarted.faq6Q: What about usage policies and security?
getStarted.faq6A: Gigaviz enforces usage policies, access controls, and auditing to maintain security and prevent abuse.
getStarted.ctaDesc: Create an account to choose your plan, then review pricing details if needed.

mediaKit.title: Gigaviz Media Kit
mediaKit.subtitle: Official brand assets for press, partners, and community.
mediaKit.brand1: Gigaviz is a SaaS ecosystem for Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage.
mediaKit.brand2: Indonesia-first and global-ready, with a modular approach.
mediaKit.brand3: Security-first: access control, audit, and workspace separation.
mediaKit.brand4: Operated by PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia.
mediaKit.northStarDesc: Four pillars that guide module design and user experience.
mediaKit.logoFileFormat: Files are available in PNG format.
mediaKit.usageGuide1: Keep clear space at least the height of the letter G.
mediaKit.usageGuide2: Do not rotate, stretch, or add effects.
mediaKit.usageGuide3: Use the mark for small sizes, horizontal logo for headers.
mediaKit.bgVariationsDesc: Use the gold variant on dark backgrounds and the dark variant on light backgrounds. If unsure, use the horizontal logo on a navy background with high contrast.
mediaKit.colorsDesc: The colors below follow the current Gigaviz design tokens in the UI.
mediaKit.typoPrimary: Primary font: Plus Jakarta Sans (text and UI).
mediaKit.copyDesc: Use these descriptions for press releases, partner decks, or product catalogs.
mediaKit.copyShortText: Gigaviz is a SaaS ecosystem that unifies create, automate, monetize, and manage modules in one account. Built Indonesia-first and ready to scale globally, Gigaviz helps teams work fast without losing control, security, and visibility through consistent workspaces, billing, and audits for operations, creative, and customer comms so daily decisions stay measurable.
mediaKit.copyStandardText: Gigaviz is a digital product ecosystem that helps businesses, creators, and ops teams run end-to-end processes: Create, Automate, Monetize, and Manage. With one account and workspace, teams can activate modules like Core OS for identity and billing, Meta Hub for WhatsApp Cloud API, Helper for AI, Office for documents, Studio for creative assets, plus Marketplace, Arena, Apps, Pay, and Community as growth layers. The Indonesia-first approach covers local needs, while modular architecture keeps it ready for global scale. Security is foundational: role-based access control, audit logs, and workspace-level data separation. Gigaviz is operated by PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia and focuses on measurable outcomes—helping teams move fast without losing control. We provide transparent release statuses (Live, Beta, Coming Soon) so partners can plan implementations. Each module is built to interconnect, enabling data, access, and costs to be monitored from a single dashboard with concise reports and periodic audits.
mediaKit.copyTaglineText: Integrated digital ecosystem for Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage.
mediaKit.contactEntity: Business entity: PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia.
mediaKit.contactMediaDesc: For media questions, please reach us via the Contact page.
mediaKit.ctaDesc: Download assets, use the official copy, and explore our modules.

roadmap.title: Gigaviz Development Direction
roadmap.subtitle: This roadmap provides an overview of our main focus areas. The order may change based on user feedback and business priorities.
roadmap.ctaDesc: Tell us about your team needs so we can prioritize the most relevant features.

testimonials.title: Trusted by early adopters across Indonesia
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from teams using Gigaviz in production during our beta program.
testimonials.beta_note: All testimonials are from verified beta program participants.

rina.name: Rina Susanti
rina.quote: We moved from manual WhatsApp replies to Meta Hub and our response time dropped from 2 hours to under 5 minutes. The unified inbox is a game changer for our small team.

budi.name: Budi Adrianto
budi.quote: The workspace management and role-based access lets us onboard each client as a separate workspace. Clean multi-tenant architecture that just works.

sari.name: Sari Dewi
sari.quote: Helper's AI suggestions for WhatsApp replies save us hours every week. It understands context from our knowledge base and drafts responses that sound natural.

dimas.name: Dimas Pratama
dimas.quote: Sending WhatsApp templates to 500+ customers used to take our team a full day. With Meta Hub's outbox worker, we queue everything and it just sends. Reliable and fast.

maya.name: Maya Kartini
maya.quote: We manage 3 clinic branches each as its own workspace. The billing and entitlements system keeps everything organized and the audit trail gives us full visibility.

arief.name: Arief Wicaksono
arief.quote: Helper's CRM insights helped us identify our top 20% customers by message frequency. We created targeted promotions and saw 35% higher engagement on WhatsApp.

productMetaHub.metaDesc: WhatsApp Cloud API hub for templates, webhooks, inbox, scheduler, and analytics with a focus on compliance and scalability.
productMetaHub.heroDesc: WhatsApp Cloud API hub for templates, webhooks, inbox, scheduler, and analytics.
productMetaHub.summaryNote: Meta Hub runs on top of Core OS for authentication, workspace, and billing.
productMetaHub.summary1: WhatsApp Cloud API integration for WABA and Phone Number ID (independent provider, BSP as upgrade path).
productMetaHub.summary2: Template Manager and Webhook Receiver for approval, incoming messages, and delivery status callbacks.
productMetaHub.summary3: Shared Inbox and Campaign Scheduler for scheduled broadcasts with opt-in/opt-out.
productMetaHub.summary4: Delivery/read/fail analytics and campaign performance summaries.
productMetaHub.featuresTitle: All essential components for modern team messaging
productMetaHub.featuresDesc: Meta Hub combines integration, template management, inbox, scheduler, and analytics in one place.
productMetaHub.feature1Desc: Connect WABA/Phone Number ID directly to Gigaviz. Currently independent provider; BSP available as upgrade roadmap.
productMetaHub.feature2Desc: Manage approved templates, categories, languages, and dynamic variables for consistent messaging.
productMetaHub.feature3Desc: Receive incoming messages and delivery status callbacks for internal system synchronization.
productMetaHub.feature4Desc: Centralized inbox for team replies. Assignment and notes are on the roadmap.
productMetaHub.feature5Desc: Scheduled broadcasts with timing control. Advanced segmentation is planned.
productMetaHub.feature6Desc: Manage user consent and respect unsubscribe requests.
productMetaHub.feature7Desc: Delivery/read/fail reports and performance summaries per campaign.
productMetaHub.complianceDesc: Designed to support WhatsApp rule compliance and maintain delivery reputation.
productMetaHub.compliance1Desc: Message delivery is designed to support valid consent, and opt-out requests must be honored.
productMetaHub.compliance2Desc: Templates follow Meta guidelines and go through official approval before use.
productMetaHub.compliance3Desc: Designed to support rate limiting to avoid bans and unexpected cost spikes.
productMetaHub.compliance4Desc: Data protection principles and abuse prevention are applied incrementally based on team needs.
productMetaHub.howTitle: Simple workflow from integration to analytics
productMetaHub.how1Desc: Link your Meta account and approved number to enable message delivery.
productMetaHub.how2Desc: Set up webhook endpoints for incoming messages and delivery status.
productMetaHub.how3Desc: Prepare templates, categories, and languages, then submit for approval.
productMetaHub.how4Desc: Schedule broadcasts and manage team conversations from the shared inbox.
productMetaHub.how5Desc: Monitor delivery, read, fail metrics and activity logs for evaluation.
productMetaHub.faq1A: WhatsApp Cloud API is Meta's official API for sending and receiving WhatsApp messages programmatically from your server.
productMetaHub.faq2Q: Do I need a verified business account?
productMetaHub.faq2A: Not always to get started. However, business verification is often required for templates and higher sending volumes.
productMetaHub.faq3A: Core features are available, but some capabilities are still developing. Changes and adjustments may occur.
productMetaHub.faq4Q: How do opt-in and opt-out work?
productMetaHub.faq4A: Messages are sent only after user consent. Opt-out requests must be honored and stored as preferences.
productMetaHub.faq5A: Cost is determined by Meta based on template category, destination country, and conversation type.
productMetaHub.faq6Q: What's the difference between independent provider and BSP?
productMetaHub.faq6A: Independent provider uses Cloud API directly from Meta. BSP is an upgrade path for enterprise support and additional services.
productMetaHub.faq7A: The platform is designed to support throttling and schedule control to maintain delivery quality and cost efficiency.
productMetaHub.faq8A: Designed to isolate data per workspace and log important activities for audit compliance.
productMetaHub.relatedTitle: Foundations and policies supporting Meta Hub
productMetaHub.related1Desc: Foundation for accounts, workspaces, billing, and RBAC across all modules.
productMetaHub.related2Desc: Learn Gigaviz usage rules and privacy policy.
productMetaHub.related3Desc: Subscription plans for messaging modules and team needs.
productMetaHub.ctaDesc: Start WhatsApp Cloud API integration and manage campaigns with your team.

integrations.catDeploymentDesc: Built and shipped with modern tooling; continuous delivery for the ecosystem.
integrations.catDomainDesc: Domain management used alongside the stack; no endorsement implied.
integrations.trademarkDesc: WhatsApp, Meta, and other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Integrations do not imply affiliation or endorsement.

trust.statusNote: This status powers the Meta Hub module; it does not replace the Gigaviz Ecosystem brand or imply Meta endorsement.
trust.evidenceCaption: Sanitized screenshots from Meta Business Suite verifying Technology Provider status.
trust.meaning1: Technology Provider — WhatsApp Business Platform (Cloud API).
trust.meaning2: Onboarding completed (2/2 steps); designed for policy-aligned messaging flows.

trust.trademarkDesc: WhatsApp, Meta, and other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. The Technology Provider status and integrations do not imply affiliation, partnership, or endorsement by Meta.

runs.title: Run History
runs.description: View execution history for all your workflows.
runs.emptyDescription: Activate a workflow to see execution history here.

office.title: Office Documents
office.description: Create and manage AI-powered documents, spreadsheets, invoices, and reports.
office.emptyDescription: Create your first document with AI assistance.
office.lockedDescription: Upgrade to Starter plan or above to create AI-powered documents, spreadsheets, and reports.

new.title: New Document
new.description: Choose a document type and let AI help you create it.
new.aiPromptPlaceholder: Describe what you want the document to contain. AI will generate the initial content for you...
new.aiPromptHint: Leave blank to start with an empty document.

detail.emptyContent: This document has no content yet.
detail.emptyHint: Use the editor to add content or generate with AI.

templates.title: Document Templates
templates.description: Start from a template or create your own. Templates power AI document generation.
templates.emptyDescription: Templates will appear here as you create reusable document formats.
templates.lockedDescription: Upgrade to access the template library.

images.title: AI Images
images.description: Generate stunning visuals and graphics with AI — logos, illustrations, marketing assets, and more.
images.emptyDescription: Create your first AI-generated image to get started.
images.lockedDescription: Upgrade to Growth plan or above to generate AI-powered images and visuals.

new.title: New AI Image
new.description: Choose a style and describe what you want to generate.
new.titlePlaceholder: e.g. Hero Banner for Landing Page
new.aiPromptPlaceholder: Describe the image you want AI to generate...

detail.generationPending: Image will appear here once generation is complete.
detail.noImageHint: Add a prompt and generate your AI image.

videos.title: AI Video Planner
videos.description: Plan professional video storyboards with AI — scene breakdowns, narration scripts, visual direction, and music suggestions.
videos.previewBanner: Beta — AI generates storyboards, scripts, and scene plans. Real video rendering coming soon.
videos.emptyDescription: Create your first AI video storyboard to start planning.
videos.lockedDescription: Upgrade to Growth plan or above to plan AI-powered video storyboards.

new.title: New AI Video Storyboard
new.description: Describe your video concept and AI will generate a detailed storyboard with scenes, script, and production notes.
new.aiPromptPlaceholder: Describe the video concept — AI will plan scenes, write a script, and suggest music...

detail.generationPending: Storyboard will appear here once AI planning is complete.
detail.noVideoHint: Add a prompt and AI will generate a detailed storyboard.

music.title: AI Music Composer
music.description: Plan original music compositions with AI — structure, instruments, mood, and production notes with waveform preview.
music.previewBanner: Beta — AI generates composition plans and waveform previews. Real audio rendering coming soon.
music.emptyDescription: Create your first AI music composition to start planning.
music.lockedDescription: Upgrade to Growth plan or above to plan AI-powered music compositions.

new.title: New AI Composition
new.description: Choose a genre and describe your music — AI will plan the structure, instruments, mood, and generate a waveform preview.
new.aiPromptPlaceholder: Describe the music you want — AI will plan structure, instruments, and mood...

detail.generationPending: Composition plan will appear here once AI planning is complete.
detail.noAudioHint: Add a prompt and AI will plan your music composition.
